title: 3 and Out - Week 1 NFL Preview + 3 for the $$$ Picks
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Week 1 NFL Preview + 3 for the $$$ Picks
description:
John reacts to the Bills beatdown of the Rams in L.A. in the 2022 opener, and touches on the storylines he’s watching heading into the opener. Then, he previews the Week 1 NFL slate, and runs his top 3 Week 1 NFL picks by Action Network sharp Stuckey to see if there's professional agreement or disagreement! 

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content. It's always FanDuel for the best wagering action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
